text: Aleksandr Ivanovich Lenyov (; 25 September 1944 – 12 November 2021Умер чемпион СССР, новомосковец Александр Ленёв ) was a Soviet and Russian footballer. He played as a midfielder or defender. He played for the USSR national team between 1966 until 1968. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian footballers Category:Soviet footballers
title: Aleksandr Lenyov
